original_text: Let them praise the name of the Lord: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
korean_text: 여호와의 이름을 찬양할지어다 그의 이름이 홀로 높으시며 그의 영광이 땅과 하늘 위에 뛰어나심이로다

sentences.original_text: Let them praise the name of the Lord
for his name alone is excellent
his glory is above the earth
